titles.title: MARITIME Act
Maritime Academy Reinvestment And Training Improvements for Mariner Employment Act
MARITIME Act
A bill to establish a program to provide assistance for education and research harbors.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Maritime Academy Reinvestment And Training Improvements for Mariner Employment Act or the MARITIME Act
This bill directs the U.S. Maritime Administration to provide assistance for the construction, installation, or maintenance of harbor projects that will support a federally owned vessel operated by a state maritime academy or a nonfederal oceanographic research facility.
The bill designates state maritime academies as centers of excellence, making them eligible for maritime workforce training and education assistance.
